descriptions:
li:
History taking and case conceptualisation is phase 1.
li:
Phase 2 is the preparation phase
li:
Then we move into phase 3, the assessment phase, which is when we set up the processing
li:
Phase 4 is desensitisation. That's where we're using bilateral stimulation. 
li:
And then we go into phases 5-8: the installation of the positive cognition, the body scan, closure and reevaluation. This is the phase I'm going to focus on in this video.
p:This mini-course includes a role play covering phases 5-8.
p:It is available to watch for 6 months after purchase.
